text:
Tomcat.java class uses commons logging directly rather than using Juli. This causes you have to use two logging configurations.

Could you please use Juli so everything can be configured with the same system?

creator: markt@apache.org
text: There isn't a single reference in that class to commons logging. There isn't even a logger defined.

Sorry I meant util.logging

the methods silence and setSilent use it.

> Tomcat.java class uses commons logging directly rather than using Juli. This

You need to set the system property java.util.logging.manager to point to whatever logging mechanism you prefer to use.
